parameters.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the KMS customer managed key for EventBridge to use, if you choose to use a customer managed key to encrypt events on this event bus. The identifier can be the key Amazon Resource Name (ARN), KeyId, key alias, or key alias ARN. If you do not specify a customer managed key identifier, EventBridge uses an Amazon Web Services owned key to encrypt events on the event bus. For more information, see Identify and view keys in the Key Management Service Developer Guide.

parameters.name: DeadLetterConfig
parameters.description: Configuration details of the Amazon SQS queue for EventBridge to use as a dead-letter queue (DLQ). For more information, see Using dead-letter queues to process undelivered events in the EventBridge User Guide. Arn (string) --- The ARN of the SQS queue specified as the target for the dead-letter queue.

nested_params.name: Arn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the SQS queue specified as the target for the dead-letter queue.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The event bus Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS customer managed key for EventBridge to use to encrypt events on this event bus, if one has been specified.

nested_items.name: DeadLetterConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration details of the Amazon SQS queue for EventBridge to use as a dead-letter queue (DLQ).

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SQS queue specified as the target for the dead-letter queue.
